title: Judy Evans: The Guiding Light of Atlas City

story.text: Judy Evans starts her week guiding young explorers on a city museum tour. Little does she know that her latent powers are about to surface.
While tutoring at the community center, Judy discovers she can manipulate electromagnetic fields to generate light and energy, a revelation that comes in handy when a sudden blackout occurs.
As Judy experiments with her new abilities, she stumbles upon a burglary at an electronics store and manages to scare off the thieves with a spectacular display of bright, blinding light.
Word of Judy's heroics begins to spread. Inspired, she decides to use her powers for the greater good, designing a costume with reflective panels that amplify her light.
Judy's first official night out as 'The Guiding Light' involves stopping a tense hostage situation. Her light manipulation not only disorients the criminals but also signals the police.
During a community picnic, Judy discreetly uses her powers to entertain and teach kids about solar energy, intertwining her hobbies of guiding and tutoring with her new identity.
Judy reflects on her week, feeling more connected to her community than ever. She vows to keep her city safe, shining her light wherever darkness may linger.

ending: By harnessing her unique powers, Judy turns her simple hobbies into tools of hope and safety for everyone in Atlas City.
moral: Even ordinary talents can become extraordinary when they are used to help others.
